commands.name: prettier
commands.summary: Used by the pre-commit Git hook. This command invokes Prettier to reformat staged changes.

commands.name: changelog:check
commands.summary: Checks change files have been generated

commands.name: ensure-consistent-versions
commands.summary: Ensure that package versions for released artifacts are consistent
commands.description: Ensure that package versions for released artifacts are consistent.

commands.name: copy-change-entries-to-stable
commands.description: Every build and test command will run based on beta version.

commands.name: pre-stable-bump
commands.description: Copy all stable entries, and stable changelog into the place. Backup beta changelogs.
commands.shellCommand: cpy change/stable/entries/*.json change && cpy packages/**/CHANGELOG.* change/beta/log --parents && cpy **/CHANGELOG.* ../../../ --parents --cwd=change/stable/log

commands.name: post-stable-bump
commands.description: Copy changelogs back to stable folder, restore beta changelogs. Remove all stable entries.
commands.shellCommand: cpy packages/**/CHANGELOG.* change/stable/log --parents && cpy **/CHANGELOG.* ../../../  --parents --cwd=change/beta/log && rimraf change/stable/entries/*.json

commands.name: bump-stable
commands.description: Every build and test command will run based on beta version.
commands.shellCommand: rush pre-stable-bump && node common/config/node_modules/beachball/bin/beachball bump && rush post-stable-bump

commands.name: switch-flavor:beta
commands.description: Every build and test command will run based on beta version.
commands.shellCommand: rush install && cpy common/config/env/beta.env common/config/env --rename .env && node common/scripts/invalidate-build.js

commands.name: switch-flavor:stable
commands.description: Every build and test command will run based on stable version.
commands.shellCommand: rush install --variant stable && cpy common/config/env/stable.env common/config/env --rename .env && node common/scripts/invalidate-build.js

commands.name: build:all-flavors
commands.summary: Build all flavor in one command (mainly for api update)
commands.description: Build all flavor in one command (mainly for api update). This command will switch current flavor to beta.
commands.shellCommand: (rush switch-flavor:stable && rush rebuild) || rush switch-flavor:beta && rush rebuild

commands.name: test
commands.description: Run jest tests in each project.

commands.name: build:watch
commands.summary: Trigger incremental build with watch command.

commands.name: prettier:check
commands.summary: Check prettier formatting in each project.
